author: Staff Reporter
text:
IT dept. forms

control room

The Director General of Income Tax (Investigation) has formed a control room with toll free number in Chennai.

The move has been made to receive complaints and information from the public on movement of unaccounted money in the Union Territory.

The control room will work on 24X7 basis and public can provide information regarding movement of unaccounted cash either through toll free telephone no (1800 425 6669), fax (044 2827 8799), a release said.
title: Page 3/19marpyspd03 control room
